name: Super-FlatBoy
description:
A fun challenging adventure game were you play as a boy. 

Try to collect the 3 stars for more challenge.

How to play: arrows to move, space to jump and F to respawn.

hope you enjoy it, and thanks for playing.

for contact or feedback: gamesdevs@zoho.com

Version:1.1

Music and sounds from https://www.zapsplat.com

art from https://www.gameart2d.com
